sys_soap_message.name: CHS SOAP
sys_soap_message.wsdl_xml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?> <definitions xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:SOAP-ENC="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:tns="urn:task" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" targetNamespace="urn:task"> <types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="urn:task" > <xsd:import namespace="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" /> <xsd:import namespace="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" /> <xsd:complexType name="result"> <xsd:element name="data" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="message" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="createRequest"> <part name="number" type="xsd:string" /> <part name="room" type="xsd:string" /> <part name="description" type="xsd:string" /></message> <message name="createResponse"> <part name="result" type="tns:result" /></message> <message name="statusRequest"> <part name="number" type="xsd:string" /></message> <message name="statusResponse"> <part name="result" type="tns:result" /></message> <portType name="tasksPortType"> <operation name="create"> <documentation>Submit a task to Cornell Hotel Services</documentation> <input message="tns:createRequest"/> <output message="tns:createResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="status"> <documentation>Check on a submited task</documentation> <input message="tns:statusRequest"/> <output message="tns:statusResponse"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="tasksBinding" type="tns:tasksPortType"> <soap:binding style="rpc" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="create"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:tasks#create" style="rpc"/> <input><soap:body use="encoded" namespace="urn:task" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/></input> <output><soap:body use="encoded" namespace="urn:task" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/></output> </operation> <operation name="status"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:tasks#status" style="rpc"/> <input><soap:body use="encoded" namespace="urn:task" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/></input> <output><soap:body use="encoded" namespace="urn:task" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/></output> </operation> </binding> <service name="tasks"> <port name="tasksPort" binding="tns:tasksBinding"> <soap:address location="https://www.gardiner-hotels.com:443/chs/soap/index.php"/> </port> </service> </definitions>
